#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int gcd(int a,int b)
{
	if(b==0) return a;
	return gcd(b,a%b);
}
int main()
{
	int t;cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int x1,y1,x2,y2;
		cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2;
		int col=abs(x2-x1);
		int row=abs(y2-y1);
		if(row==col)
		{
			cout<<row<<endl;
			continue;
	        }
		if(row==0||col==0)
		{
			cout<<0<<endl;
			continue;
		}
		cout<<row+col-gcd(row,col)<<endl;
	}
}
